duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate sales leads and aggressively pursue new business to business opportunities.
Maintain a book of residual income and prioritize opportunities for maximum revenue generation.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and critical business discussions with potential clients.
Use persuasive communication skills to optimize client acquisition and maintain client relationships for future revenue growth.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to drive client acquisition and manage client interactions effectively.
Participate in training programs to enhance sales skills and learn about new products and services offered.
Participate in high-performance sales activities and maintain a high level of persistence and motivation to achieve sales goals.
Demonstrate leadership qualities as a sales professional and a compelling communicator.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
